data.message: How do I remove Facebook stories from the top of my iPhone app. I do not intend to use this or watch anyone else's. I use instagram for that.

replies.message: Thanks for reaching out, Patrick. You will be able to swipe away from these features when you don't want to create content or flip through Stories that friends have shared and continue browsing your News Feed like you've done before. However, people cannot remove these features from the Facebook app. -Jon
